page.title: 14Trade - Local Shops
page.content: There are only 15 shops open in Cwmfelinfach.Before the mine closed in 1964 there were 33! The village is now without a chemist or a bank although the Sub Post Office is stil open.Most of the shops still in business are small family run businesses employing 2 or 3 people.The people in them are friendly and talkative.All the shopkeepers said that their trade was affected by large hyper markets,Asda, Carrefour and Leos open a few km. away. The local stores are used mainly by old people and those unable to travel to the large Superstores. My family use the newsagents for papers and comics,we seldom use the other shops Mum says they are too dear.Occasionally we use the fish shop especially if they have had a long night in the club or pub.
